## wasPillbugPush() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Determine if a move was a pillbug push.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function wasPillbugPush(color: Color, move: Move, board: GameBoard): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

color


</td><td>

[Color](./hive-lib.color.md)


</td><td>

The color of the player who performed the move.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

move


</td><td>

[Move](./hive-lib.move.md)


</td><td>

The move in question.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

board


</td><td>

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)


</td><td>

The state of the game board \*after\* the move.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

true if the move was a pillbug push, false otherwise.

## Exceptions

[NoTileAtCoordinateError](./hive-lib.notileatcoordinateerror.md) Throws if there is no tile at the destination of the move.

## Remarks

This function is typically used to determine if the latest move in a game was a pillbug push
